_header: The slow man is but a dry tree that no fruit will bearen
_description: A triplet on the slothful man in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
þe slauwe man is but a driȝe tre þat no froit wil
                    berenOf al is time in þis werld at þe dom he sal
                    ansueren& afterward han helle pine but penance mou him weren
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 5.
